Authority for Determining Minority Status and the Propriety of Making Direct Payments to Children
Determinations as to a beneficiary’s status as a minor and the propriety of making direct payments to children are governed by
State law as to the age of attainment of majority
38 U.S.C. 5502
, and
38 CFR 13.100(a)(3)
.
